forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn breaks gently over Downtown San Francisco, revealing a day adorned with promise. The skies, kissed by sunlight and streaked with clouds in a delicate ballet of soft blues and pale golds, convey a serene clarity. A light west-northwest breeze whispers through the city streets, gently nudging the chill of night into memory as temperatures edge toward a comfortable embrace in the mid-sixties. 

Yet, the subtle presence of the marine layer lingers just beyond sight. The fog, a familiar companion, retreats but will remain a specter to the west, cloaking the Golden Gate in ephemeral veils. For the discerning observer, this day feels pleasant—a perfect opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the waterfront beckons with the promise of fresh air and coffee. As the sun climbs, a light jacket or sweater will suffice for those heading outdoors, a gracious nod to the lingering coolness and the occasional playful gust. A visit to a local art gallery or an intimate café will harmonize beautifully with the calm of today, creating a tranquil canvas against which life’s subtleties can unfold.
